price: Kuma suka ce: "Ya Ubangijinmu! Ka gaggauta mana da rabonmu, a gabãnin rãnar bincike."*
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
footnotes: * Wannan ita ce maganar dukan kãfirai na kõwane zãmani mãsu nħman rabon dũniya kawai, ba su yarda da Tãshin Ƙiyãma ba, balle sãmun sakamako a cikinsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā ʿajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabla yawmi al-ḥisābi
